snippet: Ms. Tarbotton helped convince big banks to stop financing mountaintop removal mining and helped persuade Disney to reduce its use of paper made from trees cut down in rain forests.
abstract: Rebecca Tarbotton, environmental activist, dies at age 39.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Tarbotton helped convince big banks to stop financing mountaintop removal mining and helped persuade Disney to reduce its use of paper made from trees cut down in rain forests.

headline.main: Rebecca Tarbotton, Environmental Activist, Dies at 39
